name: array_diff_key
purpose: Computes the difference of arrays using keys for comparison

return.description:
Returns an array containing all the entries from
   array1 whose keys are not present in any of the
   other arrays.

notes.description:
This function only checks one dimension of a n-dimensional
    array. Of course you can check deeper dimensions by using
    array_diff_key($array1[0], $array2[0]);.
